results.title: Aging: Disease or "natural" process? A glimpse from regenerative medicine.
results.text_hl: While anti-@<m>DISEASE_Aging_Premature</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019588 @@@aging@@@ research unveils promising interventions like @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Sirolimus @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020123 @@@Rapamycin@@@, and cellular therapy, achieving biological immortality remains a formidable challenge.

results.title: Chronic HIV Infection and Aging: Application of a Geroscience-Guided Approach.
results.text_hl: Therefore, drugs that target any of the pillars of @<m>DISEASE_Aging_Premature</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019588 @@@aging@@@, including @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Sirolimus @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020123 @@@rapamycin@@@, and @CHEMICAL_NAD @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009243 @@@nicotinamide adenine dinucleotide@@@ precursors, may also slow the rate of onset of age-associated comorbidities and @DISEASE_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D013577 @@@geriatric syndromes@@@ in PWH.

results.title: A geroscience perspective on immune resilience and infectious diseases: a potential case for metformin
results.text_hl: Though rigorous translational research and clinical trials are needed to test this empirically, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may improve host immune defenses and confer protection against long-term health consequences of @DISEASE_Communicable_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D003141 @@@infectious disease@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Aging_Premature</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019588 @@@age-@@@related @DISEASE_Chronic_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D002908 @@@chronic diseases@@@, and @DISEASE_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D013577 @@@geriatric syndromes@@@.
